articles.title: Britain gets ready for rollout of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine this week - Reuters
articles.description: Britain is preparing to become the first country to roll out the Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine this week, initially making the shot available at hospitals before distributing stocks to doctors' clinics, the government said on Sunday.
